lead_paragraph: Everton have agreed a deal with Dutchman Ronald Koeman to become the Premier League club's manager, the BBC reported on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Everton Agree Deal for Manager Koeman-Report
headline.main: Everton Agree Deal for Manager Koeman-Report

snippet: Everton have agreed a deal with Dutchman Ronald Koeman to become the Premier League club's manager, the BBC reported on Tuesday....
